project("NeuralAmpPlugin")

    add_compile_options(/bigobj)
endif()


list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../../builder")
list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../../../FRUT/prefix/FRUT/cmake")
include(Reprojucer)
include(projectTemplate)


set(NeuralAmpPlugin_jucer_FILE
  "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/GainPlugin.jucer"
)

set(NeuralAmpPlugin_SPECIFIC_NAME "Ballzzy's amp")
set(COMMON_JUCE_MODULES_PATH "C:/Users/Marius/Documents/JUCE/modules")

set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 17)
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED ON)
set(CMAKE_CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
add_definitions(-DJUCE_MODAL_LOOPS_PERMITTED=1)

target_link_libraries(NeuralAmpPlugin_Shared_Code PUBLIC NAM)


target_link_libraries(NeuralAmpPlugin_Shared_Code PUBLIC AudioDSPTools)

add_custom_command(TARGET NeuralAmpPlugin_VST3 POST_BUILD
        COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E copy_if_different
        "$<TARGET_FILE:NeuralAmpPlugin_VST3>"
        "D:\\vstcreation\\$<TARGET_FILE_NAME:NeuralAmpPlugin_VST3>"
)
